page.title: 18FARMING LOCAL SURVEY 2
page.content:
{Norton Arable farm. A lot of machinery is used to produce the following' Potatoes 20 tons per acre wheat 4 t.p.a. barley 3 t.p.a. peas 2 t.p.a swedes 25 t.p.a grass 4 t.p.a. Farmyard manure and nitrogen / potahate/potah are added to soil . The potatoe are used for crisps and the other crops as animal feeds
{Forge Pig Farm 900 land race pigs are fed on potein and corn in special contract units.
{Norton Farm (sheep) 150 scots half bread cross suffolk are reared for meat and wool which is sent for carpets at Hereford . Winter feeding is silage and sweds grown on the farm .
